column4: I have three systems A windows box (my wife) my laptop (hardy desktop) and my file server (hardy server) earlier I could not get the two desktops to see the server. I added another system to the mix (a faux server) then all of a sudden everything came on line. I got rid of the faux server and I couild see my shares on the files server. Reboot my ubuntu laptop and now it can't see the windows box and the server????? What?
I am hoping someone can help me cause I wasted like 5 hours on this
Windows shares, I understand your pain, may I suggest a FTP solution ? would it work for you ?
I would perfer stay away from the ftp because it adds files to my desktop
